Name: MGMGMG_10
Title: Great Art
Review: Recently visited for the second time.  Very good group exhibition spread over a few rooms and a solo exhibition in others.  Got to meet one of the artists and observe another doing some work.  Great to see such a fantastic space for local artists to show their work.Food looked good at the cafe.  There was also a performance in the amphitheatre.Highly recommend a visit for anyone interested in the arts.

Name: arjunajb
Title: Marvelous Amphitheatre & Magnificent Inauguration of Rajasthan Kabir Yatra 2019
Review: I salute the Organisers and Volunteers of Rajasthan Kabir Yatra 2019 for selecting this beautiful venue for the Inauguration Event..the venue with its design, architecture and acoustics did full justice to the event..the performance by each artist was phenomenal and a Special Salute to Dappu Khan from Jisalmer.. would love to attend more such events including theater at the Jawahar Kala Kendra

Name: reubenranjanfern2017
Title: Great art.
Review: This place hosts some of the best local art collections. Very well maintained and displayed. Must visit.

Name: YouTuber
Title: Perfect place for Art drama connoseiours
Review: Jaipur is known for its heritage and traditions. And Jawahar Kala Kendra is redefining the very essence, with its sincere efforts. Truly amazing to visit!Don't forget to savour the canteen food.

Name: rjpriyanka
Title: Art
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is the home of art for rajasthan state. Best of the art exhibitions are organised here.

Name: Umang A
Title: Art
Review: This is the Art capital of Rajasthan. This place house best of the exhibitions of art collections. South Indian restro is also cool here.

Name: Pawan Kumar
Title: Arts and Culture hub of Jaipur
Review: Aperfect place for anyone interested in these. The design is unique which doesn't matches with usual architecture of Rajasthan. Amenities are all sorted and there is a theater inside, an open theater, huge open space for fest and also dedicated indoor space for photo and art galleries.Indian Coffee House is running at the center inside serving hot coffee and fresh food at affordable price. JKK Jaipur is located on JLN Marg and it is easily noticeable from moving traffic.Paid and safe parking option is also available.

Name: archapurvp
Title: A must visit for art lovers
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is an excellent place to visit art exhibitions by various artists from time to time. The architecture and interior spaces are intriguing. It has a good cafeteria which offers a budgeted meal.

Name: roamerviji
Title: Most happening place in jaipur
Review: Weekend gateway for family.Every visit it provides chance to learn something new, sometimes its drama,music or Architecture.

Name: ParthUdayShah
Title: What a lovely art gallery and space to meet artists!
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is un doubtedly one of the best art galleries/exhibition space made for artitsts that I have visited in the country. The place simply is electric in its atmosphere and dynamic in its many qualities. The restaurant/cafe is superb! The courtyards and the amphitheatre lively.We were fortunate to be around during the Indian Ceramics Triennial.  Added attraction.

Name: Basant_Maheshwari
Title: Remarkable Architecture for a Cultural Centre
Review: almost flawlessly designed and laid out architecture providing segregated vast areas for display of art objects and cultural events. This place can easily qualify to be one of the prominent cultural center of the country. Events at this venue certainly should be followed.

Name: arunarajepatil
Title: A great campus!
Review: Designed by Charles Correa the place has a great ambience for all creative people and artists. They have a great auditorium for screening films, a theatre for plays and great spaces for exhibitions etc. I happened to teach a screenwriting course there for 25 days and the space allowed for so much creativity to emerge. Just loved being there!

Name: vinod1952
Title: A Lively Place
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is a very lively place. There is a lovely library with books for people of all tastes. There are theatres for different types of programmes showing plays and cultural programmes. Jawahar Kala Kendra hosts different types of fests to promote the local artisans and handloom products where people from all over Rajasthan come to display their products. During the summer season, a variety of classes are arranged for the young ones to learn acting, play, dance and music.Jawahar Kala Kendra boasts of 2 cafes, the Quaint and the Indian Coffee House. The Quaint is a slightly expensive joint but is good value for money. The Indian Coffee House is non ac area but is always bustling with activity. Their coffe should not be given a miss.

Name: foodie g
Title: Regular visitor
Review: Jawahar kala kendra is just 5 minutes away from my place. Jawahar Kala Kendra is a multi arts centre located in Jaipur in India. It was built by Rajasthan government with the purpose of preserving Rajasthani arts and crafts.

Name: Nicola W
Title: Is it really the space on the mind?
Review: The architectural space manipulation and space management of this masterpiece is incredible. More than anything this piece of art utilizes the spaces on the mind to create visual spaces.

Name: Umang A
Title: Hang out....
Review: The place which has ensured art is safe and secure in Jaipur. Most famous art gallery of Rajasthan.... Filter coffee is must here...

Name: Raaj K
Title: Nice Place to Show case Arts For Young Budding Artists
Review: Has a lovely Big space for Artists to Showcase their work with Coffee Shops and Cafeterias around.  Large space for Big Conferences and a Lovely Library on Arts n Crafts of India.

Name: Govind Ram Singh
Title: A must visit for art lovers
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra also known as JKK is a famous and remarkable building in Jaipur. Its designed by Charles Correa, one the best architect of India.The campus run as a Multi art center which have Auditorium, art and exhibition galleries, live music shows, theater and dance show. entry mostly free but some time some show or event a a very nominal fee of 50 or 100 INR. In side JKK there Indian coffee house and a cafe which offers variety of foods.It also has a library with very interesting collection of books.Its a perfect place for you if your soul is artistic and creative.

Name: Sweta P
Title: Nice experience
Review: In weekends there are so many people use to visit, almost exhibitions are going on, food item too available, enjoyed a lot.

Name: shanupce137
Title: Great place...
Review: We friends went here for a exhibition. It was such a lovely place. It also has a auditorium, many play's also performed here. Many art and craft fair held here.

Name: Sanjay S
Title: Good Exposure of Traditional Handicrafts
Review: Good Place to explore during the weekends with families where lot of exhibitions has been displayed. Nice cafe is also there where you can also have good breakfast.

Name: Vijay Kumar M
Title: Cinematographer
Review: Great event by Himmat shah, curated by Roobina Karode. Nicely placed. Hoping to see more in near future.

Name: cbk2911
Title: Multi art centre of Jaipur
Review: its a Multi Art centre of Jaipur and has the objective of retaining Rajasthani culture of Folk dance & music. We attended the show of Bhavai dance & other folk dances at this cultural centre & enjoyed those. It has amphi theatre, closed auditorium & museums.

Name: Mayank Srivastava
Title: Nice place
Review: This is a very nice place. If you want to see the art & culture of India,  this is the right place. Many cultural events happen here at time to time.

Name: maninderkaur
Title: Most Peaceful Place
Review: Very Nice and peaceful place. Very good place for entertainment and education.They have a library and a museum open for visitors during office hours.Paid parking is available. Food Court is available.

Name: alpha08
Title: good place for artist
Review: peaceful place to sit and work , there is an of food also so if you are hungry while working you can eat , good and hygienic food

Name: ukheria
Title: Lovely place, relaxed and value for money
Review: I was looking for a place to have a relaxed chat with my colleague, and my friend suggested Jawahar Kala Kendra.The building looked grand and appealing. It is supposed to be the cultural hub in Jaipur, and you immediately sense it from the moment you enter. The place was active, with exhibitions and cultural displays, but there was a sense of calmness all around.We headed to their coffee shop, run by the India Coffee House. It was open-air, with about 25-30 tables for seating. Barring 4-5 tables, the rest were occupied on a Monday afternoon. The service was relaxed, with an air of "come, sit, order when you feel like, sit till whenever you want to". We ordered for coffee and sandwiches. The coffee and food was average, but the ambience of the place was lovely. Go for the ambience if you are looking for a relaxed place, and the artsy stuff if you are interested in culture.

Name: ranjanapathak
Title: Place for entertainment and education
Review: This is a Government of Rajasthan enterprise to encourage young artists in the field of Dance, drama, painting, handicrafts, and cinema. Regular short duration classes are held in these fields, and on completion, the students give their performances. They have two auditoriums and one open space stage. Regular exhibitions are held and good amount of sale is done. Every Friday a play is staged. Some programs are free of cost, and some have nominal ticket cost. They have a library and a museum open for visitors during office hours.  Paid Parking   is available. We are regularly visiting this place in the evenings for one or the other program and take our dinner in the coffee house within its campus.

Name: Dhanpatraj D
Title: Art lovers Place
Review: Nice place for the people who love art and culture. Good to see variety of display and exhibitsactivities all thru the year for people of all ages.

Name: Ashok Ganapathy Iyer
Title: Jaipur... A Contemporary Interpretation
Review: Charles Correa and his masterpiece, this monument reflects to grandeur of the city of Jaipur and reflects it within the contemporary context of India and what it stands for

Name: sbharech
Title: A serene and calm place
Review: JKK is a must visit place in Jaipur. It has wonderful architecture designed by Charles correa. Various exhibitions and events take place on a regular basis.

Name: ria m
Title: Hangout place
Review: I often visit this place to hang out with my friends. This place is very nice for long chit chats with coffee. The cantine is service all kind  of fast foods in very reasonable price.

Name: sid_ups
Title: Like a temple for a artist
Review: This is famous for the events where an artist come to show his/her talent. Artist from any field get an opportunity here like theatre artist or others. There is a library, shilpgram, Indian Coffee House also situated here.

Name: Paridhi7392
Title: Jkk
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is very famous in Jaipur Rajasthan. its construction is mind blowing must visit location.

Name: Om Joshi
Title: Centre of Arts
Review: I was Officer on spacial duty at JKK when it started. Worth visiting place for the following reasons.1. Its architecture is worth visiting. 2. Art galleries   3. Open air theatre .4. Regularly organised country handicraft market.5 Coffee house and relexation.

Name: princ512
Title: Great art
Review: The best place to see crafts in Rajasthan it is a must visit place . the arts and craft here are very good and a great place to see Rajasthan culture

Name: Deepak R
Title: Nice Place for art lovers........!!
Review: Heart of Art Lovers in Jaipur... Place for Live shows concerts dance singing and Peace. Place with a soul....Deepak RajputJaipur

Name: Verchasv
Title: Multi Art Center
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is a multi arts centre located in Jaipur. in the jkk the indian coffee house include boundary.In a year many types of exhibition are taking many types of things and housing keeping material.

Name: Fountainhead_81
Title: Architectural Masterpiece by Eminent late Architect Charles Correa
Review: Salute to one of the Greatest Architect of this Era....Late Ar.Charles Correa.....The vision he had to juxtapose heritage, Local architecture to Modern Context with rather modest approach is a magic in itself...Planned on the concept of Navagrahas.....Must see destination, with visual play of Natural light thru' pergolas, cutouts....

Name: Trav
Title: Nice exhibtions
Review: Nice place to spend some relaxed time. Lots of exhibition displays. Particularly good were the movies on canvas. Nice architecture. Small coffee shop where lot of regulars seem to be hanging out.

Name: Anshu M
Title: Cultural center and a great hangout place
Review: This is a cultural hub for theater lovers. The plays are very good. Auditorium has very elegant seating and huge space. I always love the plays here. Most of the times you will find some handloom expo going on which is also good.There is a cafe inside which is very cheap and serves great snacks.Must go.

Name: Rohit S
Title: Great place to hangout and delicious food
Review: we love the cheese omelette. chai is good but too sweet. Shakes are good. Dosa is okay. The shop has decent gift items for creative folks.

Name: jitendra g
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: Jawahar kala kendra is very famous for various activity and garden in jaipur. nice place to visit with friends and family.

Name: SupriyaSaraswat
Title: Beautiful place!
Review: It is a beautiful building designed by the famous architect Charles Corea. It has some nice art galleries with beautiful paintings. The building itself is a piece of art with very well designed spaces and the central amphi theatre. It has a cosy little Canteen space. The building is a beautiful piece of art, calm, peaceful and something to appreciate. Everyone must visit this lovely place.

Name: joshisandeep
Title: exibition
Review: It is a good place for cultural lovers and exhibition can be seen, sometime haat also there to purchase.

Name: Dhanpatraj D
Title: Good place for children
Review: This place also has additional advantage of open space; green space 'good parking. Place for activity and events

Name: Vikramaditya C
Title: Exhibition, Open Theatre, Coffee House
Review: A must visit place for theatre lovers, art lovers, for spending leisure time and having quick bites...Here are theatres where you can enjoy various dramas and shows which are organized from time to time...The Indian Coffee House: It is one of the best places to spend time for friends and couples... Here you can sit as long as you wish to... However the food quality is not very good but still its decent...The Gallery: Here are 3 galleries, where artists display their beautiful creations... If you have interest in this, you will find it really good...Open Theatre: Perhaps it is the only open theatre of its kind in Jaipur... Here you can enjoy the shows which are organised from time to time... Or you may also sit here if you wish sit in some open place...Apart from this, the way Jawahar Kala Kendra has been made is unique and antique... The pictorials on the ceilings and walls are very good...Overall, it is must visit place...

Name: kamakshi2015
Title: The Centre for visibility of art !m
Review: This Centre is known to many as the Centre for performing art events and for the major work art on display . Located on the beautiful J L N Marg , the access is very easy by the auto / taxi , public transport. The cafe located inside the Centre is a hub of the budding artists . The open air theatre here is a watering hole for the art lovers of Jaipur . Also , the Indian coffee house attracts many for a South Indian  experience of food offered here . Check the timing . No entree fee . Also , within the walking distance from -.there are various models of the eco friendly mud houses of the traditional village architecture of different regions of the Rajasthan  can be seen .There is also a beautiful Rajasthani Thali / al carte lunch at the adjoining restorant can be enjoyed if your visit coincides with the visit here . Prices are friendly to he pocket in this  food joint . A must visit . Would recommend .

Name: joshisandeep
Title: Place to visit
Review: It is place on Jawahar lal nehru marg, A person can enjoy coffee at coffee house and Rajasthani Dal bati.

Name: Namita S
Title: Amazing school
Review: The school is such a wonderful concept. There is so much of artwork and the architecture is amazing. The idea behind the school and the concept are great.

Name: Dhanvee D
Title: " A place for art lovers "
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is a hub for art exhibitions, craft melas and other cultural activities. Entry is free for everyone. Most of the time some or the other activities are going on. It has an Indian Coffee House to enjoy for all the foodies.

Name: Travellerkush
Title: Place where A Nomad's soul can experience Peace
Review: If you are in Jaipur, this is a must go. As you got it from the name, place for artists, actors, painters, lot of social activities are being held here, every year there is a big craft Mela organized, where local vendors came from every part of India, has  Indian Coffee house as well to serve the foodies, try Butter bread with chai. Overall a very soothing, and less crowded place to chill.

Name: Sanjy66
Title: I found love of my life here while acting in a theatre production
Review: I was a student of dramatics at jaipur and while acting as a heroine in a play by badal sarkar evam indrajit and a few stories by eminent scholar writers I found my hubby here at jawahar kala kendra.designed by Charles correa the place is an example if fusion between heritage and modern architect.it is full of vibrant yet subtle energy.rupayan rangayan,krishnayan the tastefully done up canteen holds you here for long.surrounding lush gardens and desi haaṭ are so indulging.this time I showed my children where there mom and dad decided to tie an eternal knot of two souls.met my old drama professor and felt traveling by the golden past......go have a piece of your own jawahar kala kendra forever and comeback time and again to cherish these memories of cheers,lights,sounds and  giggles of people happy over this beautiful sight.no fee go free and with grace to be a part of art and culture.

Name: MKBhatnagar
Title: Jawahar Kala Kendra
Review: One of the Land Mark of Jaipur known for cultural activities, programs, exhibitions and many other social events.The Building has been designed as per Vastukala and Normally events, activities are going on most of the times. Entry is free for all can enjoy food  court inside. People from different state come  here to participate in "Mela" organized time to time. its worth seeing place specially in evening with family members or friends.

Name: Mona C
Title: nicely designed spaces
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra (JKK) has been designed by Architect Charles Correa -  a very renouned Indian architect. the architect wanted this cultural centre to be user friendly and inviting instead of being imposing so you entre from the sidewalk and walk down a few steps then take a short ramp to reach the 'gateway' so reminiscent of old cities. The cafeteria is worth spending time in as the largish space has been divided into personalized spaces with strong shadows of pergolas on the white walls. the open air theatre carries the flavour of temple ponds with their steps in geometric placements. a nice palce to walk thru in leisure to enjoy the richness of unimposing design

Name: Bharat K
Title: Architecture to admire
Review: What a place for Art lovers. Lots of open spaces, gardens, and well maintained.Beautifully designed with an array of art galleries.An open amphitheatre, and an air-conditioned theatre (An amateur/village/town group of artists perform every Friday evening) at extremely reasonable rates,A nice cafe (Indian Coffee House) serving sandwiches, fries, South Indian foods, several other items like pakoras, samosas and hot & cold drinks.Every once in a while you have the Handicraft Melas in the Village like designated area inside the premises, and worth a visit.Madhuban (also reviewed seperately by me) - a dhaba like restaurant situated on the premises offers great meals at reasonable rates. Not air-conditioned, so please select your timing suitably.

Name: Richa Kedia
Title: ineteresting cultural centre
Review: This place is better than IHC in Delhi in terms of open space and architecture. I can spend the entire day here just relaxing and exploring the plays or other cultural programs here. The coffee shop is awesome and the prices there are in decimals- 19.20 Rs etc, thus taking you to another time altogether!!

Name: Thetravelvoyager
Title: Nice Place for Art and Culture Lovers
Review: The Jawahar kala kendra is known for hosting the events and exhibitions associated with alt and culture. There are various galleries which hosts the art exhibitions of various artists, photographers etc. The local fairs related to handicrafts and art frequently happens in this place.

Name: Anuj_Agnihotry
Title: Represents the Symbol of ART
Review: Jawahar kala kendra the name represents the place for the artists,  the ambiance is very attractive and artistic, there is a big open auditorium for live shows, and separate place for Exhibitions(photo gallery etc), if you heard the name indian coffee house before so you simply cannot miss that in there, a very nice place to hangout and so very cheap.also if you are lucky then you are able to watch some Art and craft fair and that is so v amazing. you will defiantly enjoy the place.

Name: Leena C
Title: For Art Lovers!!!
Review: If you are an art lover, you should visit this place. If you get a chance to visit its handicraft exhibition, don't miss it. Apart from it, you will definitely find other from of art such as sculptures, paintings, photography galleries, folk dances, folk theater, drama etc. Their Schedule changes frequently as per the availability of the programme.

Name: drnaveenbp
Title: My Favorite Place to Meet and Chat in Jaipur!!! Enjoy the Coffee too!!
Review: Located on the JLN Marg, this is a Landmark. You can easily get here. Don't hurry here, spend sometime. There are classes going on for various arts here and there are exhibits on sale. I love the Coffee in the Indian Coffee House located inside and been here many times to spend sometime and relax talking with friends on a weekend especially.

Name: GautamAgarwal
Title: The show house
Review: Went to pay my visit to some cultural exhibition. This place hosts the majority of cultural Plays and also hosts exhibition. Nice architecture. one this i would mention is the canteen is very good, Great food at a very low rate.

Name: agarwalridhi
Title: amazing architecture!
Review: this is a wonderful place with the most amazing architecture. it reflects the real heritage of jaipur.

Name: gauravonline
Title: Must visit in the Jaipur itinerary !
Review: Visit to this exhibition centre is must when visiting Jaipur city. Not usually included in the City tour, this place anchors Cultural exhibitions and the Central amphitheatre is a great space for performing arts.

Name: kamakshi2015
Title: Iconic show piece of Jaipur
Review: This Mecca of artists is a very happening place . The occasional theatre ,music and the art events keep it in the lime light . The beautiful well spread out building is actually the show piece of Jaipur . An inexpensive and lovely Rajasthani thali meal and at the adjoining restorant is most satisfying and welcome change in a relaxing atmosphere . Worth the visit .

Name: Manish B
Title: Place of Cultural Activities
Review: Its the place for art lovers and also you can see fairs during winters and get to know the culture of different states

Name: RajasthanBorn
Title: Keep housing exhibitions
Review: Good for attending exhibitions, especially in winters. It has a decent restaurants where items are reasonably priced. Good place for students as lot of colleges are nearby. I believe it also keeps organizing some theatres or some such cultural events.

Name: PStrawberry
Title: Good for exhibitions and cultural events
Review: Good for exhibitions and cultural events. its very well maintained and probably the best place in Jaipur for tests and events.

Name: anderupollimy
Title: taste of india
Review: i saw acting practice and live theater for actors and than enjoyed t Indian dishesh in there restaurant in very good prices

Name: Seema B
Title: CULTURAL EVENTS & hANDICRAFTS EXHIBITION
Review: very nice place to spend days in winter.With family and friends can enjoy holidays .Well organized & well secured place.Can have good Rajasthani food,cultural programme of Rajasthan,can shop Rajasthani handicrafts.Overall nice place to spend days.

Name: Avinash_H
Title: A nice place for cultural lovers
Review: It is huge complex having theatre and a coffee house.  Plays are being held regularly and are attended by large number of people.Similarly, the coffee house is a totally non formal place where one can sit, have something to eat/drink. Nice place which can be experienced by visiting only.

Name: 75jayaraman
Title: Place to relax
Review: Excellent place to visit, the ambience the people and the food. Lots to cherish at one place. Always one can see the crowd from the students here

Name: Martin O
Title: interesting cultural center
Review: though there is not always an exhibition on view the architecture and the branch of the indian coffee house in themselves are worth a visit. have a look around and have lunch there or a snack in the afternoon.

Name: Ankit_87
Title: Nice place
Review: Great place, the place also has a nice little restaurant. Nice place to walk about in rains.The amphitheater is well made.

Name: Prashant Kulshrestha
Title: Lovely place
Review: It's multi art center & has beautiful architecture. you can watch drama depends on events. You can enjoy arts, painting & shilpgram(handicraft village) for Rajesthan's culture. There is time to time different exhibitions always check  online before visiting the place.  This place is mainly for Arts & handicraft lovers.Food ******There is nice cafeteria inside the main building where you can have snacks & hot drinks. There is a another small open restaurant in Shilpgram which only serve nice Rajesthani cuisine dinner.

Name: Swati a
Title: Artist's Hangout
Review: Didn't know such a place existed in this city. The amount of temples and garden's dominated by temples in the city are scary and makes one think of jaipur as mono-dimesnional. This is a vibrant art place. Our friend told us how she has grown up here attending workshops as a child and now also performing some time. Culture is beyond temple and religion is reflected in the architecture of this complex designed by Charles Correa. Perfect place to have creative conversation. You may catch some performance if you look out for a schedule.

Name: Khirwar_P
Title: A glimpse of Ancient Architecture
Review: A visual treat for tourists looking for Ancient architectural sights. Famous for drama shows held at the auditorium.

Name: Aniket298
Title: A hub of & for 'Arts'
Review: To describe this place is going beyond words in it appreciation. There is some unique aura in & around this 'centre' which makes every visitor feel good. The vastu architecture does play an important role in this. The place is one hub for art lovers & theatre personnel. An exhibition of its own kind around every month is worth it to attract many families of the city. An open theatre for music concerts, folk dances, theatre etc is the best seat one can get compared to those indoor theatres & halls. A cafeteria in the name of Indian Coffee House run by the State government is one of the cheapest cafes in the city which runs full most of the time. Exhibitions, be it photography or painting adds on to the Artistic meaning to this place. Being close to this place since childhood, this is one place I visit very often to maintain my calmness.

Name: 1992abhixolo
Title: museum, a library, a cafeteria, an art-studio, are awesome
Review: A hub of arts and artistic activities and the place where classical arts and folk arts come together, Jawahar Kala Kendra was established in 1983. It truly showcases the rich heritage and tradition of Jaipur in its true essence. The center hosts a plethora of plays like Rangayan, Krishnayan, Kadva Sach, Shastra Dekho Shastra, I will not Cry and Open Theatre (fictional and mythological plays).  JKK is the brainchild of the Rajasthan Government for preserving Rajasthani arts and crafts. It houses a museum, a library, a cafeteria, an art-studio, a small hostel, art display rooms, art-studios, one amphi theatre as well as a closed auditorium. You will also enjoy visiting the art galleries that are a part of Jawahar Kala Kendra. The art gallery houses impeccable collection of paintings, artifacts and local handicrafts. The cafeteria at JKK is known for it's excellent coffee and dosa, do try to make time for some. The place is best visited when there is an ongoing presentation. You can also pick up local handicrafts here at economical prices; the painting folders sold here are excellent.

Name: aviral812
Title: Need more such places in Jaipur
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is the art hub of Jaipur. I have seen plays, heard opera, had meals at Indian Coffee House, attended handicrafts and food festivals, and sometimes come here just to sit down and relax while watching people rehearsing. I have visited this place with my family, friends and sometimes alone as well. We need more such places in Jaipur where one can easily meet artists.

Name: ddevarshi
Title: If you are an art lover then you must visit this place
Review: An artist, art critique or art lover would certainly like to visit this place. Earlier Art Gallery of Ravindra Rang manch (Ram Niwas Garden) was a happening place in field of arts but now JKK has become art capital of the town. There is an open air theater, two other theaters, art galleries and a coffee house in this area. The huge open campus is used for handicrafts exhibitions. There is no entry ticket. During the summer vacations of schools, the kendra (Center) also organizes classes for teaching fine, performing or visual arts to young kids. In a way it is mini Bharat Bhawan for Jaipur.

Name: MarianneF26
Title: Cool and relaxing place
Review: This is one of my favourite spots in Jaipur. The atmosphere is relaxing, and you get a break from the huzzling and buzzling streets of the city. This is also a place where they arrange concerts, dance preformances and art exibitions. And don`t miss the craftfair at Holi. In the eating section I love their Special Dosa and Cold Coffee! :)

Name: Oiane S
Title: New-traditional architecture
Review: Not to miss if you are following the Charles Correa heritage. I liked the idea of creating a hub for arts, music, cinema.Reminds me a little bit ot Jantar Mantar, the astrological idea is flowing in these spaces.

Name: Steve H
Title: In need of TLC but still an engaging building
Review: Designed by Charles Correa, this building, essentially an Indian Arts Centre, is a welcome counterpart to all the historical edifices in Jaipur. It draws on traditional spatial arrangements but pushes and pulls them into a modern context. Definitely berth a visit, but the fabric of the building desperately needs maintenance& care.

Name: Nagendra_Rajawat
Title: Hang out place for students
Review: Its proximity to a couple of colleges and Rajasthan University helps it attract hordes of students. The reasonable prices of refreshments served there also is a big draw among students. A good place for a short chit chat or long discussions. It keeps on hosting several exhibitions related to handicrafts. Recommend visit to the place if some exhibition, play or some other fine arts activity is going on.

Name: vivekjaipur460
Title: exhibition place
Review: visit this place if interested in exhibition, personal shoes by some artist. just ok. not a must to visit .

Name: pia_qcner
Title: art in great piece of architecture
Review: theater performances, cultural events and exhibitions collected in great modern architecture (my thing). green area around with outdoor museum with reconstructions of traditional villages from around the Rajasthan (museum is not impresive though). you would have to check what is happening there on spot, because most of events are temporary. there is restaurant/buffet inside where you can enjoy typical Indian cuisine for a fair price. good place to hang out and no so turistic.

Name: Pinakin81
Title: Art is the Heart of the city
Review: Travellors with some time must make it a point to visit JKK which is a showpiece room for all arts, like painting,photography,pottery,sculpture, performing arts and for various handicrafts and other exhibitions.Its well manicured lawns and hedges and flowers and soothing architecture separating the various areas and a permanent village like ambience in exhibition area gives a feel like walking in a garden and is much visited place by the connoisseurs.The friday theatre and a very good indian coffe house which serves authentic south indian snacks among others is recommended.one should not leave jaipur without a visit here in the evenings.Pinakin lalsodagar

Name: profpmlakhotia
Title: The Cultural Soul of the Pink City
Review: Have been in the India's cultural hub that Jaipur is, for two decades now coming from the cultural capital that Calcutta ever has been, I have visited Jawahar Kala Kendra every now and then. Its gallerias, theatrical arenas, its lavish gardens and open areas and its Shilpgram - the mini craft village have their unique charm. And one would be hardly satisfied to have visited the place without enjoying the tidbits of its Coffee House. Once in a while, one gets hurts about its maintenance and reception approach but once you start enjoying what it offers, one is bound to forget the lack of human skill as compared to its natural beauty and artistic aroma.

Name: ar_pragya
Title: for love of art
Review: landscape to drama..all in one ...jkk is heart of jaipur if your love is art...architect charles corea has made a woderful space inside the city that takes you away from the city..but truly inside it

Name: Sheesh
Title: Nice place for Art lover!
Review: I always enjoy the Friday theater here. It is a awesome place. Even food and craft markets are really nice. It is a best place for art lovers.

Name: dpagrawal24
Title: Hub of creativity and culture!
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is the hub of so many cultural and creative activities in the pink city. The place is well managed and centrally located. My only grouse is the parking facility. Why don't the administartors of JKK allow people's vehicles to be parked inside the premises?

Name: Dharmendar
Title: Cultural Hub
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra is better known as JKK and is a cultural hub that attracts a lot of artists, musicians and other craftsmen. Regular craft exhibitions, music performances and art exhibitions keep this place very active. There is a coffee house that adds to the over all ambience of the place. Its designed by one of India's top architect's so definitely worth visiting.

Name: Ruby Roy
Title: Wonderful Cultural Centre for Arts
Review: I went one night with my colleague Govind and his family to see A thousand and one nights in Urdu - Hindiish... The building is extra ordinary with an amphitheatre, art work and a great café restaurant that serves great Dosa and anything else you w ant. I actually went there three times sof far...

Name: Saurabh Saxena
Title: Good if there is some exhibition on
Review: I visited this place when a handicraft exhibition was on. The exhibition was pretty good and had many varieties of items. The institute sells painting folders on very economical rates, so if you are a collector then you will enjoy purchasing the same.

Name: Capt Sudhir Dixit
Title: A Indian Coffe House
Review: Its worth every penny. Dont expect a smiling waiter in a rush but a place with time in hand and no luxuary in hand.A place worthy for interaction, students, artists and after a tour of exhibition round, must stop over place for south indian coffee n dosa, idly.

Name: dprakash533
Title: treasure of india's art n culture
Review: this is a v. esthetically made building spread on a large area.it has spacious fields also with it besides, it has an open theatre in which v can see performances of many artists.in it's coffee house a good quality n cheap food and coffee r served.jkk hosts many exhibitions,craft melas and other do's almost throughout the year. rajasthan diwas is also held here annually.v can find good quality silk sarees,shawls,pottery and rare handicraft items during exhibitions.it provides platefarm to many established as well as upcoming talents.

Name: naveenjain
Title: so gud .....nice facelift
Review: now jkk is doing wt it was made to do. it has appeared as a hub for all types of cultural and literary activities. a new museum has also been put up. nice place to hang around...dont miss coffee house....cheapest and the best

Name: Rajnish P
Title: Cultural Spot
Review: Jawahar Kala Kendra has every day event throughout the year. Handicrafts, Potteries, Carpets, ethnic dresses , and Rajasthani Food is the specialty. Cultural groups from all over India give there performance. Painting Exhibitions of famous as well as new painters are done. Coffee  House serves light meals and soft drinks at reasonable price.

Name: Yogesh V
Title: For Art lovers
Review: Seen many play's,Performances, Art exhibitions hub for art related activities in Jaipur. You can find information about their timings in daily local newspapers.
